item.source: Best Programming Program to use? Noob Friendly

item.title: Best Programming Program to use? Noob Friendly
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:4, topic:381379"][quote author=Mr. Bob link=topic=477137.msg3492588#msg3492588 date=1297036128]
Last test (8th grade) my IQ was 122.

Anyways, XML is not a programming language.

I strongly recommended using Eclipse (PM me for some help. Nothing just “doesn’t work” - there’s always a reason)
[/quote]

not relevant at all lol.

He was just correcting me, calm down. It’s not like he said ‘my teacher is a girl, idiot’

And where did he say he think it’s a programming program? He said his teacher thought it was a programming program.

But really, pointless argument.

But he typed it angrily, I could feel it.[/quote]
You could feel the emotions of my fingers as they flew across the keyboard?

Read full topic
item.source: Best Programming Program to use? Noob Friendly

[quote="`Alec, post:4, topic:381379"][quote author=Mr. Bob link=topic=477137.msg3492588#msg3492588 date=1297036128]
Last test (8th grade) my IQ was 122.

Anyways, XML is not a programming language.

I strongly recommended using Eclipse (PM me for some help. Nothing just “doesn’t work” - there’s always a reason)
[/quote]

not relevant at all lol.

He was just correcting me, calm down. It’s not like he said ‘my teacher is a girl, idiot’

And where did he say he think it’s a programming program? He said his teacher thought it was a programming program.

But really, pointless argument.

But he typed it angrily, I could feel it.[/quote]How was my post not relevant?

I told him my opinion of the best IDE to use for Java: Eclipse

Read full topic

item.title: Best Programming Program to use? Noob Friendly
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:381379"][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=477137.msg3492394#msg3492394 date=1297028513]

Just so you know, it’s called an IDE.

Just so you know the education level of IT here, our teacher calls VB a programming program.
[/quote]He’s probably referring to visual studio

Our teacher is a she* who calls it visual basic.

Then your teacher is a retard, it’s a programming language. Also, how was Davidi2 to know the gender of your retarded teacher without you telling him? Fucking moron.

Why the hell are you calling me a fucking moron? I was just stating a fact.

I’m calling you a moron because you assumed that Davidi2 knew your teacher was a man, and because you think a programming language is a programming program.[/quote]
I was merely stating that the teacher is a she who called the IDE visual basic. Can you please show me where I assumed anything whatsoever against David?

Read full topic
